name: Blue Eyes White Dragon
description: A legendary dragon that takes pride in its enormous power. Its power of destruction far exceeds comprehension. This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Dark Magician
description: A sinister spellcaster who possesses both power and defense. He is among the best of all Magicians. The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense. The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and didense.

name: Red Eyes Black Dragon
description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

name: Relinquished
description: This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead. While equipped with that monster, any battle damage you take from battles involving this card inflicts equal effect damage to your opponent.

name: Exodia the Forbidden One
description: The Beast you don't ever want to fuck with. This mothafucka can 1 shot all three Egyptian Gods at once.
